location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon at Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon at Bushire, encloses two receipts (not included) from the commanders of two of the Honourable Company's cruisers, the Psycheand the Discovery, together with the first of exchange (not included) for the advances made to them.
